note.p: Education: Queen's College, Galway; Royal University of Ireland. MA (1893). Trinity College, Cambridge
Career: Professor of Physics, University College, Dublin (from 1900)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1924 vol 106 pp v-ix, plate, signed by C T R W
References: W Hayes, 'Physics as well as poetry. Physicists of Ireland, edited by M McCartney and A Whitaker' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 245-246
